data.name: AMAN DHATTARWAL
data.about:
Teacher by Choice and Entrepreneur by Chance.

Last 7 years have given us love from 8 Million+ students on our YouTube Channels. Any student can watch & learn from our lectures. Have got the opportunity to be a Guest Speaker in 99 of India's Top Colleges/Universities like IIT Delhi, IIT Bombay, DU, BITS Pilani, Jadavpur and many more.

Apna College is now India's fastest growing channel for College students who love coding.
We love to teach and help students across India find their right career path.

In the next few decades, India will rise as the leader of the world with the maximum young workforce, but for this, we need some good pilots who can take us through this.
I help these young hustlers find their true potential so that they can fly India to victory.

Along with this love for animals & learning is constant.
